price: İnanıp, salih amelleri yapanlara gelince; Rableri onları rahmetine/Cennet'ine sokacaktır. İşte bu, apaçık kurtuluştur.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُدۡخِلُهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fayud'khiluhum rabbuhum fī raḥmatihi dhālika huwa al-fawzu al-mubīnu
